sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><ignore_in_now_experience>false</ignore_in_now_experience><name>x_1588110_mock_s_0.Filter courses</name><script><![CDATA[// Supondo que o campo course_type seja referenciado corretamente
var courseType = g_form.getValue('course_type');

// Filtra as opções de courses com base no tipo selecionado
var courseFilter = 'type=' + courseType;
g_form.setFilter('course', courseFilter);
]]></script><script_name>Filter courses</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-02-03 17:20:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>52ecf17083671210a6b1ffd6feaad3e7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_1588110_mock_s_0.Filter courses</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Mock SkillUp" source="x_1588110_mock_s_0">76f6e78383931210a6b1ffd6feaad377</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Mock SkillUp">76f6e78383931210a6b1ffd6feaad377</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_52ecf17083671210a6b1ffd6feaad3e7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-02-03 17:20:34</sys_updated_on><ui_type>0</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
